name: Move, Move!
description:
Move, Move! is a 3D speedrunning platformer where you die if you stop moving. Movement, is your energy source! 

Made in about a day (mostly live on Twitch). Sorry for the lack of levels! I'll maybe add more in the future :)

You can also play on GOTM: https://gotm.io/mreliptik2/move-move

Controls
  • Keyboard
    • WASD to move
    • Space to jump
    • Shift to dash
  • Gamepad
    • Joystick to move
    • A to jump
    • B or R2 to dash
Credits
  • Music
    • VoiD Gaming (action pack) https://void1gaming.itch.io 
  • Developper
    • Me! MrEliptik
